title: Tales of the Hand: Going Home By: Stephan Handbringer
description: Peer into the mind of a vampire traversing the ages, saving mortals and men.While exploring the mystery of his birth, and the tragedy of his existence.Though this tragic wind would not put out the firey heart that would fight on for souls eternal.Stephan will tell you his story from his own eyes, in the trappings of unlife that would in every moment always fight for life and right.
author: Matthew   Kowalski
